data_description.organization: The id of the Nutrislice organization. This is the first part of the URL that you access today from Nutrislice (e.g. for 'https://libertyhill.api.nutrislice.com` the organization id is 'libertyhill').

data_description.school: The school to use for the calendars.

error.invalid_organization: Unable to connect to Nutrislice API endpoint. Check the organization id you have provided.
